title: About
content:
Hi! My name is Soufiane,



I started coding 6 years ago, studied computer science, and got my bachelor’s degree in software engineering from Abdelmalek Essaadi University.

I’ve worked as a freelance web developer, worked on mutiple open projects on web, mobile and desktop platforms.

I like learning, building and making new stuff, and softwares and electronics that I'm able to understand or think of, sometimes I write [hopefully not mediocre] articles, and having discussions with interesting people.
